title: SirJohnVonSlotty
author: SirJohnVonSlotty
content: I was on a crypto convention some years ago and met the guy behind the FUN token, he sold me this really good story on how they will revolutionize the casino industry once they launch fully. Now, god knows how many year later, I can still see them around, but instead of a "revolution" or "disruption", they are mostly just hovering around the industry. Now, I'm aware that licensed casinos are tied to payment providers, and then they mostly use whichever currency that payment provider offers, but I personally would still love to see some exotic coins here and there. Something like WINk or Wagerr. So, I wanted to ask the community in which coins would make the most sense to get implemented, which ones would you like to see more off?

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Why asking, you want to start a casino or other gambling services?The ones with high marketcap and having the highest utilities like bitcoin, ether, USDT and litecoin.  With these coins, you can choose the ones with faster transaction, low fee and the ones with the highest utilities.There are gambling sites that added more coins like tron, doge and many other.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: SirJohnVonSlotty on December 05, 2022, 12:50:49 PMI was on a crypto convention some years ago and met the guy behind the FUN token, he sold me this really good story on how they will revolutionize the casino industry once they launch fully. Now, god knows how many year later, I can still see them around, but instead of a "revolution" or "disruption", they are mostly just hovering around the industry. We have BFG and Owl tokens but these are dedicated to their respective platform, the most accepted are Bitcoin, Trx, and Dogecoin, players want a fast transaction and tradeable in the market not really particular if the token is dedicated to casinos because all coins/tokens can be accepted in all casinoQuoteNow, I'm aware that licensed casinos are tied to payment providers, and then they mostly use whichever currency that payment provider offers, but I personally would still love to see some exotic coins here and there. Something like WINk or Wagerr. These tokens are not familiar to me and Fun token is seldom accepted in popular casinos, it always goes on the popularity and profitability of the coin/token in the market.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: SirJohnVonSlotty on December 05, 2022, 12:50:49 PMI was on a crypto convention some years ago and met the guy behind the FUN token, he sold me this really good story on how they will revolutionize the casino industry once they launch fully. Now, god knows how many year later, I can still see them around, but instead of a "revolution" or "disruption", they are mostly just hovering around the industry. Now, I'm aware that licensed casinos are tied to payment providers, and then they mostly use whichever currency that payment provider offers, but I personally would still love to see some exotic coins here and there. Something like WINk or Wagerr. So, I wanted to ask the community in which coins would make the most sense to get implemented, which ones would you like to see more off? FUN is only being supported by the large community of the Freebitco.in website as without this community I think right now with only two casinos they are the main coin they would very well be dead for sure as no motivation by people to pick up that token to gamble with.If you want to open a crypto casino go with the coins that are more widely used like Bitcoin,Ethereum and Litecoin,beside these coins you can add as many as you like in order to attract a bigger user base but these three coins are far more than enough for any casino as a starting point.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: Quote from: SirJohnVonSlotty on December 05, 2022, 12:50:49 PMSo, I wanted to ask the community in which coins would make the most sense to get implemented, which ones would you like to see more off?I ask myself: in a market where bitcoin is already the best currency, there is USDT which, just because of its dark history, they can still be used, there is litecoin, which has a low transaction fee and has been on the market for a long time, there is the BNB which is also an excellent altcoin, so why do you need to be adding a lot of altcoins in casinos? why would they need to create altcoin for a casino when there are already many altcoins to serve in the casino? honestly I don't even see the point of creating this altcoin FUN, there are other casinos that create their own altcoin something that I also don't see the point of

comments.author: EarnOnVictor
comments.body: This kind of question has been asked many times in this section and others, and one thing that is clear is that casinos and gamblers should not take this subject matter too seriously. This is because it's not about investment per se when it comes to the choice of the token or coin to be used often by casinos, but the convenience of depositing and withdrawing. Be that as it is, any coins or tokens that would allow low transaction fees are my choice in this regard. We have many of them, so I don't have to start making lists.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: It will be an endless suggestion but it should be bitcoin which is the most accepted and typical crypto to be accepted.I'd say endless discussion because everyone has their own bias and some may say about the native tokens of the casinos if ever they had to be suggested.While the others, they'll say about their most loved altcoin and that's for sure but I'm also sure that we all agree that having bitcoin is more than enough.

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: Bitcoin, USDT, Doge, Ethereum, BNB will be the coin that the casino will use as a means of payment, maybe there will also be many casinos that make their own coins but are quite doubtful that it will last or be able to provide benefits for the players at the casino.It's possible that the people you meet and talk about FUN Token are the initial developers of the token because the FUN Token project has been taken over by freebitcoin and already has several gambling websites that use the token as payment.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: livingfree on December 05, 2022, 01:31:43 PMIt will be an endless suggestion but it should be bitcoin which is the most accepted and typical crypto to be accepted.Yes I agree and I back it up 100% of gamblers are holders, investors, and users of Bitcoin it added to the popularity of a casino if they have Bitcoin as one of the accepted coins, if they do not accept Bitcoin, it will be placed are on the other board and that's the altcoin boards QuoteI'd say endless discussion because everyone has their own bias and some may say about the native tokens of the casinos if ever they had to be suggested.I support these native Tokens but my loyalty will always be to Bitcoin, Cryptocurrency casinos is representing Bitcoin QuoteWhile the others, they'll say about their most loved altcoin and that's for sure but I'm also sure that we all agree that having bitcoin is more than enough.Yes that's true a casino can run with only Bitcoin, but they cannot sustain with other coins, people will always look for Bitcoin.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: FUN token is the top native gambling currency among all in cryptomarketcap.It has its native casino as well, and even though it's not revolutionizing and disrupting anything, I think it's one of the most decent cryptocurrencies to invest. Not due to its gambling potential exclusively, but also due to the premium program offered at Freebitco.in for its holders, which will also benefit gamblers through extra cashback on wagers.Besides bitcoin I don't feel the necessity of another cryptos being introduced at casinos, unless they offer interesting extra benefits to gamblers inside the casinos, just like FUN at Freebitco.in with its premium features.

comments.author: joeperry
comments.body: I don't know what Wink or Wager is but I definitely want to see a high cap coin in the gambling site, don't get me wrong I choose coins like BNB, BTC, SHIB, DOGE, LTC, ETH, etc. not because they are know or famous it is the fact that the price of these coins were not as volatile as the token from the gambling site or low cap coins. Though people can choose whatever they like that's why I like to play in a Web 3.0 gambling sites as they support a lot of coins.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: I'd say most of it would be rather subjective, not really something you'd want for general-purpose use in a casino (other than the top coins using ofc), so it wouldn't really matter imo. I guess some specific tokens could be used if the casino owner (or any bigshot on it) was the dev or something similar. I myself have never really tried looking for "exotic" or anything similar type of tokens, I mostly use BTC, ETH, Doge, LTC, mostly normal tokens you'd see in most crypto casinos. Never really saw the need in the first place to use exotic tokens though, might be different if it had an inherent use.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Popular tokens and coins are already in the casinos. Once a coin gets popular, the casino has the initiative to cater to those users who want to bet those tokens like SHIB. WINK and WAGERR had been around but never did I see someone talking about the token being bet on.I have been participating in torrent activity such as seeding and have gotten millions of BitTorrent (BTT), if it's going to be used on casinos, I'd probably use it to bet.

comments.author: fortunecrypto
comments.body: Quote from: SirJohnVonSlotty on December 05, 2022, 12:50:49 PMI was on a crypto convention some years ago and met the guy behind the FUN token, he sold me this really good story on how they will revolutionize the casino industry once they launch fully. Now, god knows how many year later, I can still see them around, but instead of a "revolution" or "disruption", they are mostly just hovering around the industry. Many of the casinos that I'm playing do not have a Fun token on BFG they have their own token and with so many coins that they accept they do not have a Fun token, they rather have their own.QuoteNow, I'm aware that licensed casinos are tied to payment providers, and then they mostly use whichever currency that payment provider offers, but I personally would still love to see some exotic coins here and there. Something like WINk or Wagerr. So, I wanted to ask the community in which coins would make the most sense to get implemented, which ones would you like to see more off? Like all the others here Bitcoin is enough, Bitcoin has the biggest userbase and is on top of the market, I have seen casinos that only accept Bitcoin and they are doing good, additional altcoins are just options, Bitcoin is still the number one option, even if some casino based tokens are doing good in the market.

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: Quote from: SirJohnVonSlotty on December 05, 2022, 12:50:49 PMI was on a crypto convention some years ago and met the guy behind the FUN token, he sold me this really good story on how they will revolutionize the casino industry once they launch fully. Now, god knows how many year later, I can still see them around, but instead of a "revolution" or "disruption", they are mostly just hovering around the industry. Now, I'm aware that licensed casinos are tied to payment providers, and then they mostly use whichever currency that payment provider offers, but I personally would still love to see some exotic coins here and there. Something like WINk or Wagerr. So, I wanted to ask the community in which coins would make the most sense to get implemented, which ones would you like to see more off? FUN token make sense if added to casinos much like the CHZ, WINK, and Wagger as they are all linked to gaming. You would really think they can become big in the gambling industry but generally, it's BTC that people want. The believers of the token sure would want them added, but it depends on the casino if they can make money out of it also.

comments.author: SirJohnVonSlotty
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on December 05, 2022, 12:58:19 PMWhy asking, you want to start a casino or other gambling services?The ones with high marketcap and having the highest utilities like bitcoin, ether, USDT and litecoin.  With these coins, you can choose the ones with faster transaction, low fee and the ones with the highest utilities.There are gambling sites that added more coins like tron, doge and many other.I'm already within the industry, have been since the start of crypto gambling, but in the past few years a lot of users complained about "not offering exotic coins", which is exactly why I researched the market found out WINk and Wagerr, but overall I just have the feeling that people are complaining because they can complain, in the end the most popular coins will always be the most used. Quote from: swogerino on December 05, 2022, 01:07:30 PMFUN is only being supported by the large community of the Freebitco.in website as without this community I think right now with only two casinos they are the main coin they would very well be dead for sure as no motivation by people to pick up that token to gamble with.I genuinely didn't know this. It explains a lot about the brand then

comments.author: TheUltraElite
comments.body: This discussion has no end, everyone has their own favorite token and they want it added to the casino they regularly visit. Hence asking for the same means you will only get lists of all the other coins in this sphere.The only coin that is needed to run a cryptocurrency casino is bitcoin. The top 10 altcoins can be added to give a support to bitcoin, but that is more than enough. Brain dead shills of every new token will attempt to get their tokens added to casinos hoping that would drive the price, but this in reality is a false dream that they have.Only if the casinos give some extra benefits on using a newly added coin, it would good for the regulars, otherwise they rarely bother.

comments.author: SirJohnVonSlotty
comments.body: Quote from: TheUltraElite on December 05, 2022, 03:50:32 PMBrain dead shills of every new token will attempt to get their tokens added to casinos hoping that would drive the price, but this in reality is a false dream that they have.Only if the casinos give some extra benefits on using a newly added coin, it would good for the regulars, otherwise they rarely bother.That's the thing though, it's not the casinos who have the full control over it - it's the payments provider. I'm not sure which payments provider Stake has, I see that they have Tron, but I wanted to register with them for ages so will test it out this week. Take a look at Coinfy, BitPay or other services, they are the ones regulating what a casino can offer. Then it's up to the casino to pick out the ones they want and can afford.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Quote from: SirJohnVonSlotty on December 05, 2022, 03:48:57 PMQuote from: swogerino on December 05, 2022, 01:07:30 PMFUN is only being supported by the large community of the Freebitco.in website as without this community I think right now with only two casinos they are the main coin they would very well be dead for sure as no motivation by people to pick up that token to gamble with.I genuinely didn't know this. It explains a lot about the brand then  Just some facts about FUN token. It’s original use was a utility token for casino partnered of FUN project. The FUN company dissolved and forced to sell the token ownership to Freebitco.in but FUN is indeed used on many casino before before it became exclusive only to Freebitco.in. Possibly the time when the guy told you about is when the project is still alive and kicking. They are really revolutionizing the casino industry of crypto back then until bear market occur and forced crypto company to close due to fixed expenses while token value is decreasing hard.Still Stablecoin and major tokens with low transaction fee is still the best. Other casino tokens that suggested above is exclusively good on their own casino.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: So far, many casinos have implemented bitcoin as the main coin for gambling. But the casino also implements many altcoins like ethereum, bnb, litecoin, trx, dogecoin, ada, usdt and others. Even gambling casinos have their own tokens to use as gambling currency. Maybe you want to tokenize your casino like the casino has those tokens and I think that's fine, but you should also have the coins I mentioned above so that your users can have a wide choice of coins for depositing and gambling.
